headline: Jessica Bumpus, fashion features editor, VOGUE.com
text: Observer Ethical awards 2012 judge Jessica Bumpus    Jessica Bumpus is Fashion Features Editor at VOGUE.com. Graduating from London College of Fashion in 2006 with a first class in Fashion Promotion, specialising in journalism, she started her career at Conde Nast working as a Fashion Assistant at Brides magazine, moving online in 2007  where she worked on the launch of Stylefinder.com before becoming Fashion Features Editor of VOGUE.COM, a role which includes editing the Green Style Blog with Livia Firth, Laura Bailey and Sheherazade Goldsmith.  She has given talks at London College of Fashion about the role of the internet as fashion media as well as been a guest speaker at Vauxhall Fashion Scout's mentoring salons, where she also acts as a member of the LFW selection panel.
